code:
%%{Infra_EtcdCluster}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(Infra_IngressController) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(Infra_EtcdCluster) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(Infra_EtcdCluster) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(Infra_EtcdCluster) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot(Infra_RedisCache) Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(Infra_EtcdCluster) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(Infra_LoadBalancer) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(Infra_EtcdCluster) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(Infra_WorkerNode) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
